analysis.description:
IOGToken.canTransferIfLocked (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#431-436) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- 0 == addressLocks[_sender]

IOGToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#95-100) should be declared external
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#104-108) should be declared external
Pausable.pause (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#154-157) should be declared external
Pausable.unpause (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#165-169) should be declared external
BasicToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#217-219) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#171-172) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#172-177) should be declared external
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#245-246) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#187-188) should be declared external
StandardToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#312-315) should be declared external
IOGToken.burn (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#468-469) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x1c4b7d0e1885bd7667af3378e0c538f74e712006.sol#107) is not in mixedCase
